text: Ara tara saba'i allah‌ra kache prakasita habe [1]. Takhana durbalera yara ahankara karata taderake balabe, ‘amara to tomadera anusari chilama; ekhana tomara allah‌ra sasti hate amaderake kichumatra raksa karate parabe [2]?’ Tara balabe, ‘allah‌ amaderake satpathe paricalita karale amara'o tomaderake satpathe paricalita karatama. Ekhana amara dhairyacyuta ha'i athaba dhairyasila ha'i- ubhaya abastha'i amadera jan'ya samana; amadera kono palanora jayaga ne'i [3].’
